level.text: Except as provided in ยง404, the SHCC and SHPDA shall not review, comment upon, approve, or disapprove proposed uses of federal funds which are either of the following:
Supplemental grant applications that are for administrative increases in costs.
The SHPDA shall not review and approve or disapprove the proposed uses of federal funds appropriated for grants or contracts for research or training, as determined by the federal funding agency.
